sentences.en: A light wind ruffled the water.
Carman Kass looked girlie in a black ruffle chiffon dress.
sentences.cn: 身着黑色褶边薄纱裙的卡门?卡斯看起来仿若少女.

sentences.en: Don't get so ruffled; you shouldn't ruffle so easily.
sentences.cn: 别那么生气, 你不该那么容易发脾气.
他亲昵地拨弄她的头发。

sentences.en: He was determined, today, not to let Nancy Molineaux or anyone else ruffle him.
sentences.cn: 他今天下了决心不让南希·莫利诺或者任何其他人激怒他.

sentences.en: Her blouse has a ruffle of lace around the neck.
sentences.cn: 她的衬衫领子镶有褶裥花边.

sentences.en: His direct, often abrasive approach will doubtless ruffle a few feathers.
sentences.cn: 他那直截了当、往往还粗鲁生硬的办事方式无疑会激怒一些人。

sentences.en: I could tell that my refusal to allow him to ruffle me infuriated him.
sentences.cn: 我能看出，我不吃他那一套让他很恼火。

sentences.en: Its body plumage suddenly began to ruffle and swell.
sentences.cn: 它全身的羽毛突然竖了起来，胀得鼓鼓的。

sentences.en: My friend is always trying to ruffle my feathers for fun.
sentences.cn: 我的朋友喜欢寻我开心.

sentences.en: Nothing could ruffle the perfect composure with which she casually greets members of staff.
sentences.cn: 什么都不能扰乱她随意地和员工打招呼时流露出的那种镇定自若。

sentences.en: Politicians are usually careful not to ruffle the feathers of their constituents.
sentences.cn: 政治家们通常都很小心，避免激怒了他们的选民。

sentences.en: Suddenly she was in his arms, her wet cheek against the starched ruffle of his shirt.
sentences.cn: 突然,她拥在他的怀里了, 她那泪水纵横的面颊贴在他那烫得铁硬的衬衫绉裥上.

sentences.en: Tame birds, when approached, will stretch out their necks and ruffle their neck feathering.
sentences.cn: 驯养的鸟儿在有人靠近时会伸长脖子，竖起颈羽。

sentences.en: The seamstress bound the hem of the dress with a ruffle.
sentences.cn: 女裁缝用褶裥饰边给女上衣镶边.

sentences.en: They called him a nerd, and it really ruffle his feathers.
sentences.cn: 他们叫他讨厌鬼, 这让他觉得很烦.

sentences.en: This apparent improvement was but momentary -- it was a false calm, which the least breeze could ruffle.
sentences.cn: 这表面上的改善只是暂时的 -- 它是一种虚妄的恬静, 只要刮来一丝风就可以把它搅乱.

words.tran_cn: 弄皱；生气；鸟受惊时羽毛竖起（ruffle的过去分词形式）
皱褶；生气；混乱；连续轻敲声
弄皱；触怒；扰乱；迅速翻动

phrases.tran_cn: 使某人发怒；使某人恼火
使某人恢复平静；使某人息怒

trans.tran_cn: 褶裥，混乱，（鼓的）轻擂声，急躁，生气
trans.tran_en: a band of thin cloth sewn in folds as a decoration around the edge of something such as a collar
to make a smooth surface uneven

trans.tran_cn: 弄皱，激怒，连续地轻敲，扰乱
